subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Jason Spezza and Jamie Benn scored in a shootout, and the Dallas Stars beat the Devils, 3-2, in Newark to extend the Devils’ N.H.L. record for shootout losses to 18 straight.
snippet: Jason Spezza and Jamie Benn scored in a shootout, and the Dallas Stars beat the Devils, 3-2, in Newark to extend the Devils’ N.H.L. record for shootout losses to 18 straight.
